name: HandPass VR
description: Put on your VR headset and see if you can beat the record! A handpass is a fundamental skill in the sport of Australian Rules Football - hold the ball in one hand and punch it with the other! Handpass VR will test the accuracy of your handpasses with moving targets - and in a variety of environments from a stadium to outer space!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: IntelÂ® i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX1070 equivalent or greater Storage: 4 GB available space
